name: Bank of Hill Valley
description: A pillar of the community, the Bank of Hill Valley stands as a testament to the town's prosperity. The polished marble floors and high ceilings exude an air of quiet confidence. Friendly tellers in crisp uniforms greet you with a warm smile, and the bank manager is always ready to offer a word of advice or a sensible loan to a promising young entrepreneur. The air smells of old money, new opportunities, and the faint, reassuring scent of lemon polish.
tellerName: a friendly teller with a bright smile

messages.greeting: Welcome to the Bank of Hill Valley! How can we help you today? You can check your 'balance', 'deposit' funds, or 'withdraw' them.
messages.noAccess: I'm sorry, our services aren't available to you. It's a corporate policy thing, you understand.
messages.closed: We're closed. Come back during banking hours. We'll be here, bright and early!

messages.insufficientFunds: You don't have that much in your account. We've all been there.
messages.insufficientPurse: You're not carrying that much cash. Check your pockets again.
